<Heading

  children={"Create user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/users"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Store a new user on the system. Returns the created user and an HTTP/201
header on successful creation.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
